item.description:
Good News Everyone!

 

I finally got around to scheduling this meetup! Yay! Sorry I couldn't make the meetup for July but thank you to Viv and Budd for helping out while I wasn't able to attend!

 

The book for August is going to be The Eyre Affair by Jasper Fforde. The Eyre Affair takes place in alternative 1985, where literary detective Thursday Next pursues a master criminal through the world of Charlotte Brontë's Jane Eyre. You don't have to read Jane Eyre to read The Eyre Affair (I haven't) but I've been told it does help. 

 

We will be meeting at  Rodney's Bookstore on Mass Ave. There is parking around the corner on Green St. ($8 for the night). There is also T access and bus connections.

See you there! 
-Josh

 

P.S. - Have you read a good book recently that you think would make for a good discussion next month? Email it to me and it will go into the polls for September!
item.how_to_find_us: We are up the stairs! Hopefully in comfy chairs. But not sitting in pairs, that would be weird...
item.name: August Book Club Meeting
